Add items to a common choices list

1 In the Common Choices folder, double-click the name of the list you want to modify.

2 In the Type box, select a subgroup to display its items in the Source box.

You can limit the selection to items that contain specific text by entering the text in the Containing Text box and clicking Find.

3 In the Source box, click the check box next to each item you want to add to the Common Choices box. Items with a check mark are added automatically.

4 To save the list and continue working, click Apply.

5 To print the list, click Print.

6 When you are finished, click OK.
